annotations.description: Resident Evil 2 is back and remastered! I'm celebrating with a version of a Zombie I call: T-Virus. Tiki and the living dead? Perfect! **********************...
annotations.title: Resident Evil's T-Virus | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Lime Juice
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Allspice Dram
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Grenadine
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. Plantation 5 Year Rum
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. Appleton Estate 12 Year
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Wray & Nephew Overproof

Shake and Pour over crushed ice
Garnish with Fresh mint and a customized drink umbrella!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P-JkfOpxnD8
title: T-Virus Zombie
